item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Chartable Logo We believe audio is the next great medium. That’s why we help tens of thousands of podcasters, from the niche-iest indies to the largest media companies in the world grow their audiences. And we help advertisers understand and harness the power of audio by measuring their ads’ effectiveness, so the most engaging content gets rewarded. Source
You can download theChartablelogo on full-version of the page. ]] >
item.title: Chartable
item.description: We believe audio is the next great medium. That’s why we help tens of thousands of podcasters, from the niche-iest indies to the largest media companies in the world grow their audiences. And we help advertisers understand and harness the power of audio by measuring their ads’ effectiveness, so the most engaging content gets rewarded. Source

Clari Logo Today, our market-leading Revenue Operations Platform helps go-to-market teams of every size and stripe take control of their entire sales process and revenue operation. The result? Flawless sales execution, unprecedented productivity, and revenue forecasting that really works. Simply put: nothing else comes close. Source

CleverTap Logo CleverTap is a SaaS based customer lifecycle management and mobile marketing company headquartered in Mountain View, California. Founded in May 2013, it provides mobile app analytics and user engagement products to more than 10,000 apps. Source
You can download theCleverTaplogo on full-version of the page. ]] >

item.description: CleverTap is a SaaS based customer lifecycle management and mobile marketing company headquartered in Mountain View, California. Founded in May 2013, it provides mobile app analytics and user engagement products to more than 10,000 apps. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Craft Logo
Craft is a supplier intelligence company helping organizations accelerate data-informed business decisions. Our unique, proprietary data platform enables supply chain and procurement professionals to discover, evaluate, and monitor suppliers and create stronger supply chain resilience by tracking thousands of real-time signals across millions of companies globally. The company provides comprehensive, complete supplier data and intuitive software tools delivering best-in-class monitoring and insight into global supply chains and market intelligence as well as facilitating better and more proactive decisions that minimize disruptions and risk.
You can download theCraftlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Craft
item.description: Craft is a supplier intelligence company helping organizations accelerate data-informed business decisions. Our unique, proprietary data platform enables supply chain and procurement professionals to discover, evaluate, and monitor suppliers and create stronger supply chain resilience by tracking thousands of real-time signals across millions of companies globally. The company provides comprehensive, complete supplier data and intuitive software tools delivering best-in-class monitoring and insight into global supply chains and market intelligence as well as facilitating better and more proactive decisions that minimize disruptions and risk.
